column2: "Saul hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduasa na no mboree; na odzii Israel do hen mfe ebien na no mboree."
"Na Saul saan mu yii Israel mu mbarimba mpensa maa noho: na hɔn mu mpenu wɔ Saul nkyɛn wɔ Mikmas na Bɛtɛl bepɔw do
column3: na apem wɔ Jonatan nkyɛn wɔ Benjamin Gibea: na ɔmaa ɔman nkaa no mu nyimpa biara kɔr n’asesee mu."

column2: "Na Jonatan kum Filistiafo hɔn bansifo a wɔwɔ Geba no
column4: na Saul bɔɔ abɛn mu wɔ asaase no do nyinara dɛ

column2: "Na Israel nyinara tsee dɛ Saul eku Filistiafo hɔn bansifo no
column3: na dɛ iyi ama Filistiafo ekyir Israel. Na wohyiahyiaa aman no boaa ano kedzii Saul ekyir kɔr Gilgal."

column2: "Na Filistiafo boaboaa hɔn ano dɛ wɔnye Israel robɔko
column5: na nkorɔfo a hɔn dodow yɛ dɛ mpoano anhwea: na wɔbae

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba hun dɛ akyer hɔn do no
column3: (osiandɛ ɔman no hɔn ho hiahiaa hɔn
column4: ) nna ɔman no dze hɔnho kosumasumaa abo etu

column2: "Afei Hebriwfo no bi twaa Jordan kɔr Gad na Gilead asaase do; na Saul dze
column4: na ɔman no nyinara dze ahopopo dzi n’ekyir."

column2: "Na otsintsiim nda esuon
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mber a Samuel hyɛɛ no tse no ara: mbom Samuel dze ɔammba Gilgal; na ɔman no fii ne nkyɛn petsee."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Wɔmfa ɔhyew afɔr no mbrɛ me ha
column4: na asomdwee afɔr no. Na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ owiee ɔhyew afɔr no bɔ ara pɛ
column4: Samuel bae; na Saul puei behyiaa no kwan

column2: "Na Samuel bisaa dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Na Saul buaa dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ muhun dɛ ɔman no efi me nkyɛn apetse
column5: na wo so ammba aber a ehyɛe no mu
column6: na Filistiafo so aboa hɔn ano wɔ Mikmas;"

column2: "dɛm ntsi na mesee dɛ
column3: Afei Filistiafo rebɛba mo do wɔ Gilgal
column4: nna mennserɛɛ EWURADZE n’adom yi: iyi ntsi na mehyɛɛ moho bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr no."

column2: "Na Samuel see Saul dɛ
column3: Ayɛ nkwaseadze: enndzi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm a ɔhyɛɛ wo no do; na afei na nkyɛ EWURADZE rebɛma w’ahendzi etsim wɔ Israel do daa."

column2: "Na afei dze w’ahendzi nnkɛda ho atsena hɔ: EWURADZE ahwehwɛ nyimpa a n’akoma da no ho ama noho
column3: na EWURADZE ahyɛ no dɛ ɔnyɛ ɔhen wɔ ne man do."

column2: "Na Samuel soɛree
column3: na ofii Gilgal kɔr Benjamin Gibea. Na Saul kaan nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn hɔ no

column2: "Na Saul ne ba Jonatan na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ hɔn nkyɛn hɔ no
column3: wɔtsenaa Benjamin Geba: na Filistiafo dze wɔbɔɔ asese wɔ Mikmas."

column2: "Na adzesɛɛfo fii Filistiafo nsera mu wɔnam no ekuw ebiasa puei: kuw kor danee faa Ofra kwan do kɔr Sual asaase do:"
"na kuw kor so danee faa Bɛt-horon kwan do: na kuw kor so danee faa ɔhe a ɔhwɛ Zeboim bɔnsa ne tsentsendo no no kwan do kɔr sar no do afamu."
"Ber no nna ɔtomfo biara nnyi Israel asaase do beebiara: osiandɛ Filistiafo see dɛ
column3: Bɛyɛ na Hebriwfo abobɔ mfona na mpeaa ama hɔnho:"

column2: "mbom nna Israel nyinara wɔkɔ Filistiafo hɔ
column3: ma nyimpa biara kɛsew no funtumdadze
column5: na n’ekuma na no tutu daadze;"

column2: "na sika a wɔgye wɔ ntutudaadze na nsɔw ho no
column3: wɔgye no mbɔho ebien wɔ ndaadzefo
column4: na nkuma na nsɔsɔw no dze."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔbaa dɛ ko da no mu
column3: woennhu afona anaa peaa wɔ ɔman a wɔwɔ Saul na Jonatan nkyɛn hɔ no mu biara nsamu: gyedɛ Saul na ne ba Jonatan nsamu na wohun bi."

column2: "Na Filistiafo hɔn bansifo no puei faa Mikmas kwan do."
